author: lgawron
msg: apart from <jx:atttribute name="text" value="abc"/> you can also do:
This is most useful for nesting jx:* tags:
<jx:attribute name="value"><jx:formatDate value="${date}" pattern="dd MMMM yyyy" locale="pl_PL"/></jx:attribute>

author: tomdz
msg: Added ability to specify in the platform info to which jdbc type a native type would be mapped back
Added parameter to specify the name of the model read back from the database
